c1_name: Doctor with great patience for kids
c1_evidence: Dr. Noah has calm energy that truly helps first-time parents feel at ease.
Just met Dr. Simons for the first time. Couldn't say enough good things about him.
Dr. Noah came highly recommended by multiple families.
Dr. Noah showed excellent, professional medical care and shared a wealth of knowledge on caring for a newborn.
We feel lucky to be patients here... Dr. Simons is by far the best pediatrician I think we could have ever found in the Bay Area.
c2_evidence: Dr. Noah has calm energy that truly helps first-time parents feel at ease.
We could message him any time and he or his staff would gladly assist.
Instead of having to go to the ER during Cold/Flu season - Dr. Noah came in after hours to help our little guy.
We have never waited for an apt or had trouble getting in.
Admin support is excellent with billing etc.
We always leave feeling like our questions or concerns are addressed and our daughter is genuinely cared for.
He always tells you like it is and does not sugar coat anything, which I appreciate a lot.
Visits are quick and easy and follow up and instructions are clear.

c1_name: Doctor with great patience for kids
c1_evidence: Rachel has been our toddler's primary care provider since birth, and we absolutely love her. She provides an amazing combination of knowledgeable, compassionate and empowering care.
Nothing but the best for my little and I truly believe by taking her here instead of a hospital system is the best I can do for my little. I love the staff, the Noe office we go to.

We had a visit to pierce my son's ears. The nurse did everything in their power to distract the kid. She confirmed with me a few times on whether the markers look aligned/symmetrical to do the piercing. Took the time to get the marking right - which was awesome and on par with my expectations from all the reviews.

Dr. Getzelman and Getzwell pediatrics has been a godsend for our family. We've been with Getzwell for 4 years and continue to say with Dr. G even though we've relocated out of state. She was such an important part of making sure that my son got an early ASD diagnosis and has responded to our son's specific and chronic medical issues with care and compassion.

In this age of assembly line doctoring, where you get 15 mins with a harried physician who throw antibiotics at your kid, Getzwell Pediatrics is a true miracle and godsend to new and longer-term parents. Julia Getzelman has been my daughter's pediatrician for 10 years, and I am so grateful for her and her dedicated staff.
c2_evidence: She clearly knows what she's doing and, of course, performs thorough examinations.

I feel confident knowing that anytime I call Getzwell inside our outside of business hours that there will be someone on the other line who really understands my child and our unique medical needs to help us navigate illness, growth, and new treatment options for my

c1_name: Doctor with great patience for kids!!
c1_evidence: Dr. Meier is incredible. The care she gave our newborn, and us (nervous first time parents) was invaluable. She took the time in every visit to talk through everything and made us feel comfortable and empowered to take on our new reality. She was warm, kind, never rushed through the appointment, incredibly knowledgeable
Very good interacting with young kids.  Great with the little ones! And thank goodness because it's a pediatric practice

We absolutely love SF Bay Pediatrics. We've been patients for three years and now bring our second child there as well. We've gotten wonderful care from Dr. Amendola and Dr. Goldstein, they've been extremely knowledgeable and patient with our questions and concerns. Our kids are in such great care, highly recommend!

Thank you, Dr. W for responding.  My issue is with your billing department, not the medical staff.  The billing department is unprofessional and extremely rude. I paid a bill that I contested just to be rid of our relationship with this office.
